Function.Function_Signature: show(port: int, pixels: list[tuple[int, int]]) -> None
Function.Function_Description: Change all pixels at once on a Color Matrix

Function_Arguments.Argument_Description: A port from the port submodule in the hub module
A list containing color and intensity value tuples for all 9 pixels.

Function_Snippet.Python_Code:
from hub import port
import color
import color_matrix

# Update all pixels on Color Matrix using the show function 

# Create a list with 18 items (color and intensity pairs) 
pixels = [(color.BLUE, 10)] * 9 

# Update all pixels to show same color and intensity 
color_matrix.show(port.A, pixels)
